member.name: T:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Content.Delivery.PublishCommand
member.summary: Publishes content from the selected Content Hub instance to the delivery platform.
member.example: Publish entities to delivery platform: ch-cli content delivery publish --start-date "2022-08-01 12:00:00"

item.description: Publishes entities that have been modified after the specified date.
Defines the end of the range for entities to be considered for publishing.
If set, only failed entities are re-published.
Show this help message and exit.
Enables verbose logging.

member.name: M:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Content.Delivery.PublishCommand.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Content.ImportDataCommand
member.summary: Imports a package into the selected Content Hub instance.
member.example: Queue an import without waiting: ch-cli content import --source "<local file path or HTTP/HTTPS URL>" Queue an content without waiting and retrieve the job ID: ch-cli content import --source "<local file path or HTTP/HTTPS URL>" --job-id Perform an content with waiting: ch-cli content import --source "<local file path or HTTP/HTTPS URL>" --wait

item.description: Specifies the path to the import package. Can be either a local file path or a HTTP/HTTPS URL
Specifies the name of the import data configuration.
Specifies the path to the import configuration. Can only be a local Json file path
Determines whether to wait for the import to complete or not.
Specifies whether the job ID is returned or not.
Show this help message and exit.
Enables verbose logging.

member.name: M:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Content.ImportDataCommand.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Print.GenerateCommand
member.summary: Generates the specified entity print template against the specified entity and shows the final PDF.
member.example: Generates the entity print template: ch-cli print execute --name "<template name>" --entityId "<entity id>" --culture "<culture>"

item.description: Specifies the template name.
Specifies the entity id.
Specifies an alternative endpoint name for the execution of this command.
Specifies the culture.
Show this help message and exit.
Enables verbose logging.

member.name: M:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Print.GenerateCommand.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Print.InitializeCommand
member.summary: Initializes a working folder with the files needed to generate a entity print template.
member.example: Initialize an entity print template: ch-cli print initialize --name "<template name>" Initialize an entity print template to specific folder: ch-cli scripting initialize --name "<template name>" --folder "<local path>"

item.description: Specifies the name of the entity print template.
Specifies an alternative endpoint name for the execution of this command.
Specifies the a working directory other than the current folder.
Show this help message and exit.
Enables verbose logging.

member.name: M:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Print.InitializeCommand.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Print.PullCommand
member.summary: Pulls an entity print template from the connected Content Hub instance into the specified working directory.
member.example: Pull an entity print template: ch-cli print pull --name "<template name>" Initialize an entity print template to specific folder: ch-cli scripting pull --name "<template name>" --folder "<local path>"

item.description: Specifies the name of the entity print template.
Specifies an alternative endpoint name for the execution of this command.
Specifies the a working directory other than the current folder.
Show this help message and exit.
Enables verbose logging.

member.name: M:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Print.PullCommand.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Sitecore.CH.Cli.Plugin.Content.Commands.Print.PushCommand
member.summary: Pushes the print template from the specified working directory to the connected Content Hub instance.
member.example: Pushes an entity print template: ch-cli print push --definition "<entity definition>" --name "<template name>" Pushes an entity print template in specific folder: ch-cli print push --definition "<entity definition>" --name "<template name>" --folder "<local path>"

item.description: Specifies the entity definition.
Specifies the name of the template.
Specifies an alternative endpoint name for the execution of this command.
Specifies the a working directory other than the current folder.
Show this help message and exit.
Enables verbose logging.
